name: Fast Feud (fastfeud)
description:
Welcome to Fast Feud. Rev up those fryers and order up some fast drive thru action. Fast Feud is a 2 player fighting game. Right now, we have three character options: Jack, Wendy, and the Waffle.  The goal is to defeat your opponent in multiple rounds.

Players have multiple tools at their disposal to serve up fresh new combos. Defeat your enemies with light and heavy attacks, feeding them a hot knuckle sandwich.

Download is for Windows only.
